text: James Edward "Jim Ed" Brown (April 1, 1934 - June 11, 2015) was an American country music singer. He was a member of The Browns with his sisters Maxine and Bonnie Brown. He also worked with Helen Cornelius and was a solo artist. He was born in Sparkman, Arkansas. Brown died from cancer on June 11, 2015 in Franklin, Tennessee, aged 81. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Country musicians from Arkansas Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Cancer deaths in Tennessee Category:Musicians from Arkansas
title: Jim Ed Brown
